title: Life and Youth - repetition of I

content.prompt: In lines 21-23 (“I cannot be . . . course”), the repetition of “I” has which of the following effects?

choices.label: It reinforces the speaker’s individualistic attitude.
It highlights the speaker’s egotistical personality.
It reveals the speaker’s antisocial message.
It exposes the speaker’s introverted character.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
